title: 1889 N172 Old Judge G Whitney For Sale ***SOLD***

posts.post_title: 1889 N172 Old Judge G Whitney For Sale ***SOLD***
posts.post_content:
Though graded "Good" by SGC, the image of the player is severely out of focus. This would be a nice way to add an otherwise good-looking graded Old Judge exemplar to your collection at a reasonable price. 

$125 net to me delivered insured. ***SOLD***

Kevin Cummings
[url]kkkkandp@aol.com[/url]
If it falls through, let me know.
